shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables the built-in encryption.

p.codeblock: public abstract int enableEncryptionEx( boolean enabled, EncryptionConfig config, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int enableEncryptionEx(const RtcConnection& connection, bool enabled, const EncryptionConfig& config) = 0;
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|IRtcEngine") int EnableEncryptionEx(const FRtcConnection& connection, bool enabled, const FEncryptionConfig& config);
public abstract int EnableEncryptionEx(RtcConnection connection, bool enabled, EncryptionConfig config);
Future<void> enableEncryptionEx( {required RtcConnection connection, required bool enabled, required EncryptionConfig config});

section.p: After the user leaves the channel, the SDK automatically disables the built-in encryption. To enable the built-in encryption, call this method before the user joins the channel again.
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.

ul.props: native electron unity rn unreal bp
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
